proposal: Hey $1999 community, remember the thrill of blowing into a cartridge to get your game to work? Now imagine that, but with a decentralized platform to trade and invest. With our B2B tools, you can create your own DEX or even a blockchain-based lottery. It's like turning your console on and finding a hidden level. Congrats on your 23 holders in the ETH network, let's power up and reach new high scores together!
